Html:
I would like to add rows to the WPF toolkit Datagrid without binding it to a datasource like datatable.

I know it is startight forward in Windows.Forms. I use the DataGridView.Rows.Add() function to do it.

Apparently WPF toolkit Datagrid did not have any such function. Is there a work around for it?

Note: Ofcourse I can use a WindowsFormHost Control and use the Windows.Forms datagridview. But I would like to use the WPF controls.
